website_summaries.verdict: A dermatologist-grade stainless steel kit with 7 different tools, plus bonus charcoal mask.
pros: With seven different tools for all your blackhead-removing needs, this kit contains everything you require
Tools fit in the included lightweight carry case
Anti-slip handles provide much-needed grip for this delicate operation
cons: Charcoal mask can be difficult to remove

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: Mask is effective. It leaves skin very soft. Be cautious that these types of black masks hurt when peeling off. It did not hurt my husband. Guess women are different.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Product Worth Using
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my skin smooth. I use it before bed, though not every night. I use it sparingly. It helps remove dead skin cells, and any blackheads that may be problematic. I don't have many problems with those, but nonetheless, the other benefits I get from this product make it worth using. It smooths the skin and brings out the natural color as opposed to a tired "gray" when the skin looks tired. With the blackhead removing tools, I feel they are a bonus when coming up against a particularly stubborn blackhead.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Stambaugh

customer_reviews.title: All Around Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quick. The tools are very good quality. It has a card for instructions on the tools. The mask is GREAT!! Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Teia DeWoody

customer_reviews.title: this product went on fairly easy, and my skin looked better even after one ...
customer_reviews.text: this helped with my oily skin and a few black head, this product went on fairly easy, and my skin looked better even after one use. Cant wait to see how it performs over the next few weeks
customer_reviews.author: babykeg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Its goes on smooth and makes my skin smooth, soft and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: SparkleOnLife

customer_reviews.title: Skin is smooth soft and glowing!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Love the way my skin felt after using this. It absolutely glowed!!
customer_reviews.author: Fayedra

customer_reviews.title: Love the mask but what are all the tools for
customer_reviews.text: Love the mask but what are all the tools for? They are not explained at all how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried it yet but I do enjoy the tools that came with it
customer_reviews.author: Christy smith

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of very small blackheads on my nose and around my mouth and chin that are very hard to remove. The mask removed many of them and the tools helped get rid of the rest of them. The directions that explain the tools could be a little more discriptive and the pictures larger. They were hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for something to help reduce my pore size and acne. I\'m sure to see better acne results I'll have to use more than just the once. However, my pore size has reduced greatly after one use, and my skin feels so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Turner

customer_reviews.title: easy and fun to apply where and how you need it
customer_reviews.text: This is a FUN mask to apply! i put it on think and had a few eye tingles peeling it off! it pulls everything out, tiny hairs included which is a HUGE bonus for ME as im of irish decent and get very peach fuzzy! I love that i can control this, do spot application, go light or heavy where i want! and the tools are such a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Reading Mom

customer_reviews.title: Mask good!  Tools okay
customer_reviews.text: The mask is pretty good, and gets the job done! The tools are good quality, although I really only use one of them regularly
customer_reviews.author: KEA

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Works far beyond what I would have ever expected and the tool set is well constructed and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Downs

customer_reviews.title: Does not remove Blackheads
customer_reviews.text: The face mask was more like a thin paint and did nothing to help "remove blackheads" now if this was sold as a hair remover I would have given it a 4 star rating! However that is not the case and then the poorly made tools that came with it was just uggghhh! To top it off after I returned it I got a follow up email asking me to donate money for the makers sick grandmother! I have empathy but unfortunately my pockets are not deep.
customer_reviews.author: Survivor

customer_reviews.title: I do suggest you read the instructions first it works a lot better!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well, I do suggest you read the instructions first it works a lot better!
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I will be buying mask stuff again. Still figuring out how to utilize the tools. But honestly I have not spent much time with them.
customer_reviews.author: toodles521

customer_reviews.title: The mask works well, but the tools did not ...
customer_reviews.text: The mask works well, but the tools did not come with instructions so I have no idea how to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he loved it too
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a black mask to use for awhile. I decided to give this one a try after reading the reviews. The reviews were on point! After using this product my skin was so smooth and silk; and for some reason my face felt lighter in weight. I also used it on my husband, he loved it too. It's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: This set really works!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this kit! There's an extractor for every type of blemish and they really work! I love the convenience of the set - how they're all kept together in the zippered case (makes it super easy to travel with and to store). The charcoal mask is great, too. I bought another brand that peeled off in tiny little flakes and it too forever to remove. With this one, I can peel the entire mask off my face in one piece. It does hurt a little, but it really gets the whiteheads out. Afterwards, my face feels baby soft and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Took my blackheads out but you need to apply a ...
customer_reviews.text: Took my blackheads out but you need to apply a large amount. even with the large amount applied, it still hurt peeling it off and if you have peach fuzz on your face or any type of hair it will hurt to remove. avoid getting this on your eyebrows as it may wax off the hair. my face was cleaner after i used this product.
customer_reviews.author: len777

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect face mask, dont hesitate to buy. It's worth every $
customer_reviews.author: zaf creation

customer_reviews.title: NO PAIN
customer_reviews.text: The tools are worth the price alone and the mask is like the bonus. Didn't rip mine or my daughters skin and works!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Clough

customer_reviews.title: ... this product I expected it to work a little better than it did
customer_reviews.text: Based on advertisements I've seen for this product I expected it to work a little better than it did. While my face feels very fresh and clean it did not remove any blackheads on my face. I've only used it one time so far and hope you have better results the next time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

product_meta.title: Stainless Blackhead Remover Tools Set - Black Mask Charcoal Face Cleaner Skin Care & Stainless Steel Tweezers Set Removes Acne Pimples on Face, 2018 Best Gift Set On Sale
feature_bullets: MULTI-FUNCTIONAL: Scuddles practical beauty tools help to remove blackheads, acne, and various blemishes easily; A diagram provided which let you can know clearly the usage of each tool

ADVISORY : Using this product correctly makes things easy, we don't suggest use any blackhead remover before the acne matured, and please wipe all tools with rubbing alcohol before and after each use and use follow the instructions

NON-ALLERGIC DESIGN: Scuddles professional electroplated needle and stainless steel antibacterial coating won't cause sensitivity issues, helps minimize risk of infection, our pimple extractor kit can work on all types of skin

ERGONOMIC HANDLE: This blackhead extractor uses anti-slip handle design help you better control the pressure during use, ensuring every step can be done with exceptional control and precision to avoid damage to the skin

INCLUDES BONUS 100ML BLACKHEAD REMOVER PEEL OFF MASK - Included with this set is a bonus black suction mask Activated charcoal blackhead peel-off mask will remove blackheads, whiteheads, acne and keep your face smoother and tender. Wear this pore mask confidently while it works for you. With its blemish extractor the black mask will be 10X as powerful
